General.Name: Shenzhen Jiawei Photovoltaic Lighting Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of lithium-ion batteries and systems. The company is also involved in the investment, construction, and operation of photovoltaic power stations. In addition, it provides solar landscape, low voltage landscape, and portable solar lights; retrofit, puff, and track lights; and LED, courtyard, and smart home lighting products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Jiawei Photovoltaic Lighting Co., Ltd. Jiawei Renewable Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
